1011100111101111 1101001101111011 0 -> sum: 1000110101101010, cout: 1

1010010001000000 0010001100111001 0 -> sum: 1100011101111001, cout: 0
0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0 -> sum: 0000000000000000, cout: 0
